events.title: Raga Yaman Evening
events.artist: Pt. Rajesh Kumar (Sitar) & Ustad Ahmed Khan (Tabla)
events.description: An enchanting evening featuring the soul-stirring melodies of Raga Yaman, performed by renowned sitarist Pt. Rajesh Kumar accompanied by the rhythmic brilliance of Ustad Ahmed Khan on tabla.

events.title: Kathak & Classical Fusion
events.artist: Smt. Priya Sharma (Kathak) with Live Music
events.description: Experience the grace and precision of Kathak dance accompanied by live classical music. A mesmerizing evening of rhythm, movement, and melody.

events.title: Hindustani Classical Vocal Concert
events.description: Join us for an intimate vocal concert featuring the sublime voice of Vidushi Ananya Desai, exploring the depths of Hindustani classical music through timeless ragas.

events.title: Thumri & Dadra Night
events.description: A memorable evening of semi-classical Thumri and Dadra compositions that touched the hearts of all attendees.

events.title: Sarod Maestro Live
events.description: An unforgettable evening with the sarod virtuoso, featuring classical ragas and improvisations that captivated the audience.
